name: autoshow
author: Anthony Campolo
description: An example workflow for automatically generating customizable show notes for audio and video files.

scripts.web: npm run up && cd web && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.start: npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=/usr/src/app/prisma/schema.prisma && npx tsx --no-warnings src/fastify.ts
scripts.docker-info: docker images && docker-compose -f .github/docker-compose.yml images && docker ps && docker-compose -f .github/docker-compose.yml ps && docker volume ls
scripts.docker-inspect: docker network inspect autoshow-network && docker inspect autoshow-service && docker inspect autoshow-postgres
scripts.prune: docker kill $(docker ps -q) 2>/dev/null || true && docker rm -f $(docker ps -aq) 2>/dev/null || true && docker builder prune -af && docker network prune -f && docker image prune -af && docker volume prune -af && docker system prune -af --volumes && docker network rm $(docker network ls -q) 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.get-db: docker-compose -f .github/docker-compose.yml exec -T autoshow-postgres psql -U myuser -d mydatabase -t -q --set AUTOCOMMIT=on --set ON_ERROR_STOP=on -c 'SELECT row_to_json(s) FROM show_notes s'
scripts.wipe-db: docker-compose -f .github/docker-compose.yml exec -T autoshow-postgres psql -U myuser -d mydatabase -t -q --set AUTOCOMMIT=on --set ON_ERROR_STOP=on -c 'TRUNCATE show_notes, embeddings RESTART IDENTITY CASCADE;'
scripts.railway-info: railway list && railway status && railway volume list && railway variables -s autoshow && railway variables -s Postgres
